name: Sandygast

evolution.description: Sandygast can evolve into Palossand at level 11 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 11 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Sand Heap Pokémon. It likes the shovel on its head, so Sandygast will get serious and fight any children who come to take it back.

abilities.name: Water Compaction
abilities.description: After being damaged by a water-type move, any other damage dealt to this Pokémon until the beginning of its next turn is halved.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to Sandstorm damage. In addition, its AC increases by 2 in desert terrain, or during a Sandstorm.
